text: This is a summary of the imaging process: * Move the reference mirror so the reference scans over the imaging depth in the sample. ¢ As the mirror is being scanned, send out laser pulses, and record the intensity of the interfer- ence signal at the photodiode. » High-pass filter these measurements to remove the reference and sample-only intensities, and leave the depth-varying AC component. ® Rectify and low-pass filter to give the ampli- tude (envelope) of the AC signal. This is the sample reflectivity over depth. * Move the laser beam to the next location and repeat.
